title: Friend cant see the club menu or options
body: my friend is lazy, and i'm not quite that bad. He cant see the club he started from when clubs just came out, called Desu Desu Desu club tag POMF!. His Ign and presumably login name as well is ihackettu. I believe hes had this problem for most of the time clubs have been out, and hes trying to get 5 members for a new club but that just seemed like alot more effort than writing this to help fix it

replies.body: Heya, I've tried to sync the club to see if that helps.  He may need to relog first, though!
he said it works now "suddenly" so thanks for the help

I remember I had a club back when they were pretty new, but after a while, it disappeared. I don't know exactly when it happened, or why. I believe the club name was "Hawaiian Style" or something along those lines, and I don't remember whether or not it had a tag. I didn't have anyone else in the club other than myself. What exactly is his problem? Is the club no longer there, or is he unable to access the Clubs tab?
